derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in sense 2): variant of commonalty. Sense 1 dates from the mid 16th cent., but was rarely used before the 1950s

entry.def: Commonality is used to refer to a feature or purpose that is shared by two or more people or things.

example.ex: We don't have the same commonality of interest...
There are an amazing number of commonalities between systems.
example.tran: 体制之间有着多得惊人的共性。
